name: @proof-of-residency/contracts
description: The Solidity smart contracts for Proof of Residency.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copy-contracts && yarn compile
scripts.coverage: yarn build && yarn run -T hardhat coverage --temp artifacts --solcoverjs ./../../.solcover.js
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run -T hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn run -T hardhat run --network arbitrum scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-rinkeby: yarn run -T hardhat run --network arbitrum-rinkeby scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run -T hardhat run --network goerli scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn run -T hardhat run --network optimism scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:optimistic-kovan: yarn run -T hardhat run --network optimistic-kovan scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn run -T hardhat run --network polygon scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:polygon-mumbai: yarn run -T hardhat run --network polygon-mumbai scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn run -T hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:local: yarn run -T hardhat run --network localhost scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:truffle-dashboard: yarn run -T hardhat run --network truffle-dashboard scripts/initial-deploy.ts
scripts.time-travel:local: yarn run -T hardhat run --network localhost scripts/time-travel.ts
scripts.lerna-publish: rm -rf ../../.git/hooks/ && yarn run -T lerna publish from-package && yarn install
scripts.lerna-version: rm -rf ../../.git/hooks/ && yarn run -T lerna version --sign-git-tag && yarn install
scripts.lint: yarn run -T solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol' && yarn run -T prettier --list-different 'contracts/**/*.sol' && yarn run -T eslint . --ext .ts
